beetl document . import java.io.Serializable; import java.util.Date; public class ${className} implements Serializable { <%for(map in columnPropList){%> /** * ${map.dbComment} */ private ${map.javaType} ${map.javaHumpName}; <%}%> <%for(map in columnPropList){%> public ${map.javaType} get${map.javaName}() { return ${map.javaHumpName}; } public void set${map.javaName}(${map.javaType} ${map.javaHumpName}) { this.${map.javaHumpName} = ${map.javaHumpName}; } <%}%> } //table properties . key:${key} className:${className} entityName:${entityName} tableName:${tableName} <% for(map in columnPropList){ %> //table-columns properties . dbName,${map.dbName} dbComment,${map.dbComment} dbType,${map.dbType} javaType,${map.javaType} javaName,${map.javaName} javaHumpName,${map.javaHumpName} <% }%> You can writing `${xxxx}` var paste to the 'textarea' .
